scripts.browserify: browserify lib/index.js --debug -t babelify --extension js --extension jsx | exorcist index.js.map > index.js && npm run normalize-map
scripts.less: lessc index.less | postcss --use postcss-assets --use postcss-font-magician --postcss-font-magician.protocol=https: ---use postcss-flexbugs-fixes --use autoprefixer > index.css
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run browserify" "npm run pug" "npm run less"
scripts.browserify:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production npm run browserify && uglifyjs index.js --mangle --compress --output index.min.js --source-map content=index.js.map,filename=index.min.js.map,url=index.min.js.map
scripts.less:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production lessc index.less | postcss --use postcss-assets --use postcss-font-magician --postcss-font-magician.protocol=https: --use postcss-flexbugs-fixes --use autoprefixer --use cssnano --map -o index.min.css
scripts.build:production: concurrently "npm run browserify:production" "npm run pug:production" "npm run less:production"
scripts.watch:js: cross-env BABEL_ENV=debug watchify lib/index.js --debug --verbose -t babelify --extension js --extension jsx -o "exorcist index.js.map > index.js"
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:map" "npm run watch:pug" "npm run watch:less" "npm run serve" "npm run live"
scripts.mochify:phantom: cross-env MOCHIFY=true BABEL_ENV=production mochify "test/unit/*.ls" "test/unit/*.jsx" --reporter spec --extension ls --extension jsx --extension js --external react/addons --external react/lib/ReactContext --external react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment --external react-dom/test-utils --external react-test-renderer/shallow --transform browserify-livescript --transform babelify
scripts.mochify:node: cross-env MOCHIFY=true mochify "test/unit/*.ls" --node --reporter spec --extension ls --extension js --transform browserify-livescript --plugin [ mochify-istanbul --exclude "**/+(test|node_modules)/**/*" --report text --report text-summary --report lcovonly --dir coverage/node ]
scripts.mochify:react: cross-env MOCHIFY=true BABEL_ENV=react mochify "test/unit/*.jsx" --node --reporter spec --extension jsx --extension js --external react/addons --external react/lib/ReactContext --external react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment --external react-dom/test-utils --external react-test-renderer/shallow --transform babelify --plugin [ mochify-istanbul --exclude "**/+(test|node_modules)/**/*" --report text --report text-summary --report lcovonly --dir coverage/react ]
scripts.unit: npm run mochify:node && npm run mochify:react && npm run mochify:phantom
scripts.test: npm run unit && npm run functional && npm run lint
scripts.api:init: cd api && sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.test:api: cd api && cross-env NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover ../node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --recursive
